text:
Vaposhop | Amsterdam, The Netherlands | Full Stack PHP Developer | ONSITE | https://www.vaposhop.com/

Vaposhop is looking for a Full Stack PHP hacker to help us develop our custom shopping software. We work in a small team, so you get to do a bit of everything. The job will involve mostly developing but also some server and network maintenance. You'll be working with PHP 7, MySQL, Linux, LXC, Ansible, etc.

-- Who we are --

VapoShop is an online vaporizer store with a distribution centre in Amsterdam. We have over eight years of experience in selling high quality vaporizers and are committed to carrying only the best home and portable vaporizers, including replacement parts and useful accessories.

You can contact us at: michele@vaposhop.com
